title: IStraightElementData.ClassificationType
description: Gets or sets the classification type of this straight hole element.
returns: Classification type as defined in swStraightHoleClassificationType_e
remarks:
This property is valid only if
IAdvancedHoleElementData::FastenerType
is set to
swWzdHoleStandardFastenerTypes_e
.swStandard*DowelHoles.
